labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The list is there including the server you just made, despite the fact you can't make invites for a server without channels.
data.expected_result: The list of servers appears, save for the one without any channels, and thus, no invites
data.short_description: The right click Invite to Server menu contains servers with no channels (text or voice)
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a server - Remove the text and voice channels - right click a user - mouse over Invite to Server
